content:
VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of unit that is used by the stem.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength* attached property.

In this Article

public enum VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
VirtualizationCacheLengthUnit

Remarks

Use the VirtualizingPanel.CacheLengthUnit attached property to specify the units of the VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength.

Fields

Item

The stem.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength* is measured in terms of the items that are displayed in the panel.
Page

The stem.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength* is measured in terms of a page, which is equal to the size of the panel's viewport.
Pixel

The stem.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.CacheLength* is measured in terms of device-independent units (1/96th inch per unit).
